main.title: Panda Print
main.subtitle: Panda Print makes it fast and easy to print your favorite photos. Just send a picture message to (510) 917-5552 and we'll print it out and send it to you!

section-1.title: Print photos with just a text message
section-1.text: Panda Print makes it fast and easy to print your favorite photos. Just send a picture message to (510) 917-5552 and we'll print it out and send it to you!
